code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'firebase/storage';import'./Form.css';import{useFirebase}from'../context/Firebase';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Fform=()=>{const[name,setNamedata]=useState("");const[email,setEmaildata]=useState("");const[Message,setMessagedata]=useState("");const[submitted,setSubmitted]=useState(false);const namedata=e=>{setNamedata(e.target.value);};const emaildata=e=>{setEmaildata(e.target.value);};const Messagedata=e=>{setMessagedata(e.target.value);};const firebase=useFirebase();const getdata=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!name||!email||!Message){alert("Please fill in all fields.");}else{firebase.putData("Feedback/".concat(name),{Name:name,Email:email,Description:Message});};setSubmitted(true);alert("Thank You for Your FeedBack & We Will  Get Back to you Soon!");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"main",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"form",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"FEEDBACK"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"feedback_form",method:"POST",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"Name",placeholder:"Your name",value:name,autoComplete:"off",required:true,onChange:namedata}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"email",placeholder:"Your email",value:email,autoComplete:"off",required:true,onChange:emaildata}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{name:"Message",placeholder:"Write here your Message",value:Message,autoComplete:"off",required:true,onChange:Messagedata}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:getdata,children:submitted?'Submitted':'Submit'})]})]})})});};export default Fform;
